title: 2BR Renovated Interior 1st Floor!
map_address: 625 E Vista Ridge Mall Dr. near MacArthur Blvd
posting_body: Bluffs at Vista Ridge, where coming home means serenity.
The apartment community is the perfect live-work-play destination.
We’re close to Lake Lewisville, DFW International Airport and lots of great shopping and entertainment venues like MainEvent.
Our apartment homes have several unique features such as island kitchens, computer niches and large walk-in closets.
These spacious floor plans are sure to complement your lifestyle.
Bluffs has so much to offer; resort-inspired pool w/sundeck, poolside entertainment kitchen, fitness center, dog park and paw spa.
If you’re searching for an apartment home in Lewisville, Bluffs is the place to be.
Come see why Bluffs at Vista Ridge should be your next home.
Professionally Managed by GVA Property Management                                        Equal Housing Opportunity
